Title: Student and Staff Computing Devices
Term of Bid: Initial Term: 3 years, Renewal 1: 1 year, Renewal 2: 1 year, Total not to exceed 5 years
Product Categories: Laptops, Desktops, Tablet Devices, Display Monitors
Bid Objective Summary: This RFP is for student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors. Vendors may submit proposals for one, several, or all categories of devices required by the District.
Technical Specifications: The specifications listed in this RFP are the minimum hardware requirements for each tier of device required by Dallas ISD. Vendors must have the ability to provide significant quantities of devices as requested in the pricing lines in this RFP.
